title: Starfield Update Review - The Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Bethesda dropped a major quality of life update on its 2023 RPG. Is it worth coming back for? Find out from Parris, Mike, and Greg!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:39 - EA Sports College Football 25 is ALMOST HERE!
00:02:59 - The Oreo Fairy is Here!
00:07:15 - Housekeeping
00:10:03 - Recapping Our Thoughts on Starfield at Launch
00:16:09 - Starfield’s Big May Update Review So Far
00:29:12 - NEW GAME PLUS SPOILERS
00:38:28 - Was Starfield Given Too Much Pressure?
00:49:55 - SuperChats
00:54:33 - Is the Update Enough to Bring You Back?
